Translations.Text: M
Ta vysvitlyuyuche svyate pysannya
My nadaly tse arabsʹki Quran, shcho vy mozhete zrozumity
Tse zberihayetʹsya z namy v oryhinali mayster, pochesnyy ta povnyy wisdom
my tilʹky Musymo proihnoruvaty toy fakt, shcho vy porushyly mezhi
My poslaly bahato proroka do poperednikh heneratsiy
Kozhnyy chas prorok poyikhav yim, vony ridiculed yo
Otzhe, my vynyshchyly lyudey shcho buly navitʹ bilʹshe potuzhni nizh tsey. My takym chynom vstanovlyuyemo pryklady z poperednikh spilʹnot
Yakshcho b vy poprosyly yikh, "Khto utvoryv nebo ta zemlyu," vony by skazaly, Mohutniy, Omniscient utvoryv yikh
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto zrobyv habitable zemli dlya vas, ta stvoryuvaly dlya vas dorohy tam, shcho vy mozhete proslidkuvaty za pravom shlyakh
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto posylaye vnyz z neba voda, u tochniy miri, shchob vidnovyty mertvi zemli therewith. Analohichno, vy budete resurrected
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto utvoryv vsi riznovydy, paramy (muzhchyna ta zhinka), ta Vin stvoryuvav dlya vas korabelʹ ta domashna khudoba yikhaty
Tomu shcho vy spyrayetesya na vershynu z nykh, vy budete otsinyty take blahoslovennya z vashoho Lorda, ta kazhete, "Slava musytʹ khto pidkoryv tse dlya nas. My ne mohly prokontrolyuvaly yikh sobi
My ostatochno vertayemo do nashoho Lorda
Vony navitʹ pryznachyly dlya Nʹoho aktsiya z Yoho vlasnoho stvorennya! Bezsumnivno, lyudsʹke isnuvannya ye hlyboko unappreciative
Vin vybrav z chysla Yoho dochok stvorennya dlya Sebe, toy chas, yak blahoslovlyayuchy vas z synamy
Koly odyn z nykh dayetʹsya novynu (dochky) tomu shcho vony zayavyly dlya naybilʹshoyi Dobrozychlyvoyi, yoho oblychchya temnytʹsya z neshchastyam ta hnivom
(Yak kazhutʹ,) "Shcho harnyy pro offspring shcho vykhovuyetʹsya shchob buty krasyvyy, ta ne mozhe dopomoha u viyni
Vony zayavyly shcho anhely, khto sluzhbovtsi naybilʹshoho Dobrozychlyvi, zhinky! Vony zasvidchyly yikhnye stvorennya? Yikhni pretenziyi zapysuyutʹsya, ta vony budutʹ prosytysya
Vony navitʹ skazaly, "Yakshcho naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvyy willed, my by ne obozhnyuvaly yikh." Vony ne mayutʹ bazy dlya takoyi pretenziyi; vony tilʹky prypuskayutʹ
my daly yim knyhu pered tse, ta vony upholding tse
Sprava v tomu, shcho: vony skazaly, "My znayshly nashykh batʹkiv vykonuyuchi pevni vpravy, ta my slidkuyemo u yikhnikh krokakh
Nezminno, koly my poslaly warner do budʹ-yakoyi spilʹnoty, lidery, kotra spilʹnota skazhe, "My znayshly nashykh batʹkiv nastupni pevni vpravy, ta my prodovzhymo u yikhnikh krokakh
(kur'yer) by skazav, 'Shcho yakshcho b ya by prynis do vas krashche kerivnytstvo nizh shcho vy uspadkuvaly z vashykh batʹkiv?" Vony by skazaly, "My disbelievers u povidomlenni vy prynesly
Otzhe, my requited yim. Prymitka naslidky dlya rejectors
Abraham skazanyy yoho batʹkovi ta yoho lyudyam, "ya zrikayusya shcho vy obozhnyuyete
Tilʹky kotryy vystupyv z initsiatyvoyu meni mozhe keruvaty meni
Tsey pryklad (Abraham) buv nadanyy everlasting urok dlya nastupnykh heneratsiy; mozhlyvo vony vykupovuyutʹ yikhni dushi
Diysno, ya dav tsym lyudyam ta yikhnim predkam dostatni mozhlyvosti, todi pravda prybula yim, ta roz'yasnyayucha kur'yeru
Koly pravda prybula yim, vony skazaly, "Tse zacharuvannya, ta my disbelievers tam
Vony skazaly, "Yakby tilʹky tse Quran bulo poslane vnyz cherez inshu lyudynu z dvokh spilʹnot (Mecca abo Yathrib) khto ye vydatnyy

vony shcho pryznachayutʹ vashe myloserdya Lorda? My pryznachyly yikhni aktsiyi u tse zhyttya, pidnimayuchy deyaki z nykh nad inshymy u ranhakh, aby dozvolyty yim sluzhymo odyn odnym. Myloserdya z vashoho Lorda daleko krashche nizh budʹ-yaki materialʹni vony mozhutʹ prykhovaty

Yakshcho tse ne shcho vsi lyudy mozhutʹ staty (disbelieving) congregation, my by harantuvaly kozhnomu kotromu disbelieves u naybilʹshykh Dobrozychlyvykh osobnyakakh z sribnymy dakhamy, ta skhody na kotri vony mohly pidnyatysya
Yikhni osobnyaky by mayutʹ vrazhayuchi bramy, ta rozkishne vbrannya
Takozh bahato prykrashaye. Vesʹ tsey yavlyayutʹ soboyu tymchasovi materialy tse nyzʹko dovichnoho. U maybutnʹomu - u vashomu Lordi - ye daleko krashche dlya spravedlyvyy
Budʹ khto khto disregards povidomlennya naybilʹshykh Dobrozychlyvykh, my pryznachayemo chorta buty yoho stalyy kompanyon
Taki kompanyony vidvedutʹ yikh z shlyakhu, vse shche roblyatʹ yim vvazhayutʹ, shcho vony keruyutʹsya
Koly vin prybuvaye pered tym, yak ny vin skazhe, "O ya bazhayu vy yak daleko z meni tomu shcho dva skhodu. Shcho neshchasnyy kompanyon
Tse ne bude console vy na shcho denʹ, tomu shcho porushnyky, shcho obydva vy podilyte u retribution
Mozhete vy robyte hlukhyy chuyete; vy mozhete zrobyty zavisku dyvytesʹ, abo tsey khto mozhe ye daleko astray
Chy my dozvolyayemo vy vmyrayete pered tse abo ne, my budemo bezsumnivno requite yim
Abo, my mozhemo pokazaty vam (retribution) my poobitsyaly dlya nykh. My ye u povnomu kontroli za nymy
Vy budete steadfastly propoviduvaty shcho vidkryvayetʹsya do vas; vy mayete ratsiyu shlyakh
Tse ye povidomlennya dlya vas ta vashykh lyudey; vsi vy budete dopytuvatysya
Pereviryayemo kur'yeriv my poslaly pered tym, yak vy: my kolysʹ pryznachyly budʹ-yakykh inshykh bohiv - bilya naybilʹshoho Dobrozychlyvi - shchob obozhnyuvatysya
Napryklad, my poslaly Moses z nashymy dokazamy Pharaoh ta yoho elders, proholoshuyuchy: "YA ye kur'yer z Lorda vsesvitu
Koly vin pokazav yim nashi dokazy, vony smiyalysya z nykh
Kozhnyy znak my pokazaly yim buly bilʹshi nizh pered tse. My afflicted yim z chumoyu, mozhlyvo vony kayutʹsya
Vony skazaly, "O vy charivnyk, blahayete vashoho Lorda vid nashoho imeni (relieve tsya chuma), z vy mayete dohovir z Nym; my budemo todi keruvatysya
Ale yak tilʹky my relieved yikhniy affliction, vony pereyshly
Pharaoh oholoshenyy do yoho lyudey, "O moyi lyudy, ya ne volodiyu tsaryuvannyam nad Yehyptom, ta tsi techuchi richky nalezhatʹ meni? Vy ne dyvytesʹ
Kotryy kozhnyy krashche; meni abo shcho odyn khto nyzʹko ta mozhe ledve rozmovlyaty
Yak prybuvayutʹ vin ne volodiye skarbom zolota; yak prybuvaty anhely ne suprovodzhuyutʹ yoho
Vin takym chynom obduryv yoho lyudey, ta vony pidkorylysya yomu; vony buly bezputni lyudy
Koly vony nastiylyvo prodovzhuvaly protystavlyayutʹ nas, my pokaraly yikh ta potopyly yikh vsikh
My nadaly yim precedent ta pryklad dlya inshykh
Koly syn Mary buv protsytovanyy yak pryklad, vashi lyudy disregarded tse
Vony skazaly, tse krashche obozhnyuyutʹ nashykh bohiv, abo shchob obozhnyuyutʹ yoho?" Vony skazaly tse tilʹky sperechatysya z vamy. Diysno, vony lyudy shcho pryyednalysya do opozytsiyi
Vin ne buv bilʹsh nizh sluzhbovetsʹ komu my blahoslovenni, ta my poslaly yomu yak pryklad dlya Ditey Izrayilya
Yakshcho my willed, my mohly zrobyly vam anhely khto zaselyayete ta vidtvoryuyete na zemli

Vin musytʹ sluzhyty yak marker dlya toho, shchob znaty kinetsʹ svitu, takym chynom vy mozhete bilʹshe ne havanʹ budʹ-yakyy sumniv pro tse. Vy budete proslidkuvaty Meni; tse yavlyaye soboyu pravo shlyakh
Dozvolyayete ne chort vidkhylyayete vas; vin ye vash naybilʹsh revnyy voroh
Koly Isus poyikhav z dokazamy, vin skazav, "ya prynoshu do vas wisdom, ta shchob roz'yasnyty deyaki z materialiv u kotrykh vy dysputuyete. Vy budete BOH povahy ta pidkoryayetesya meni
BOH miy Lord ta vash Lord, vy budete obozhnyuvaty Yoho yedynyy. Tse yavlyaye soboyu pravo shlyakh
oponenty posperechalysya sered sebe. Prykroshchi do tsykh khto porushuyutʹ z retribution bolisnoho dnya
vony chekayutʹ Hodyny (Denʹ Vyroku) shchob prybuty yim raptom koly vony naymenshi ochikuyutʹ tse
blyzʹki pryyateli na shcho denʹ stane vorohamy odyn odnym, krim dlya spravedlyvymy
O Moyi sluzhbovtsi, vy budete ne maty strakha na shcho dnya, ne budete vy sumuyete
Vony yavlyayutʹ soboyu khto viryv v nashym vidkryttyam, ta submitters
Vnosyatʹ Ray, razom z vashym podruzhzhyam, ta tishatʹsya
Proponuvaly yim budutʹ zolotysti tatsi ta chashky, ta vony znaydutʹ vse bazhannya serdenʹok ta ochi bazhannya. Vy zhyvete tam zavzhdy
Takyy yavlyaye soboyu Ray shcho vy uspadkovuyete, v obmin na vashi pratsi
Vy budete maty u tse vsi riznovydy fruktiv, z kotrykh vy hostytesya
Bezsumnivno, vynuvatyy bude perebuvaty u retribution Gehenna zavzhdy
Nikoly ne bude retribution budutʹ zaminenyy dlya nykh; vony budutʹ obmezhuvatysya tam
Tse - ne ny kotri obrazyly yikh; tse - vony kotri obrazyly yikhni vlasni dushi
Vony budutʹ blahaty: "O Maalek, dozvolyayutʹ vashomu Lordu zakinchuyutʹ nas." Vin skazhe, "Vy zalyshayetesya zavzhdy
My daly vam pravdu, ale bilʹshistʹ vy nenavydyte pravdu
vony zamyslyly deyaku skhemu? My nadto zamyshlyayemo
vony dumayutʹ shcho my ne chuyemo yikhni tayemnytsi ta zmovy? Tak diysno; nashi kur'yery z nymy, zapys
Proholoshuyutʹ: "Yakshcho naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvyy mav syna, ya dosi by yavlyav soboyu nayholovnishyy worshiper
Vin glorified; Vin yavlyaye soboyu Lorda neba ta zemli, Lorda z velykym dominion, daleko nahori yikhnimy pretenziyamy
Dozvolyayutʹ yim pomylku ta hru do vony zustrichayutʹ yikhniy denʹ shcho ochikuye yikh
Vin yavlyaye soboyu tilʹky odyn khto ye bozhestvo u nebesakh ta bozhestvi na zemli. Vin yavlyaye soboyu Naybilʹsh Mudryy, Omniscient
Naybilʹsh Exalted yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto volodiye vsim suverenitetom neba ta zemli, ta vse mizh nymy. Z Nym yavlyaye soboyu znannya pro Hodynu (kinetsʹ svitu), ta yomu vy budete vertatysya
Zhoden z tsi komu vony idolize bilya Yoho ne volodiyutʹ budʹ-yakoyu potuzhnistyu intercede, yakshcho ne yikhnye zastupnytstvo zbihayetʹsya z pravdoyu, ta vony tsilkom znayutʹ
Yakshcho b vy poprosyly yikh kotri utvoryly yikh, vony by skazaly, "BOH." Chomu todi vony deviate
Tse bude proholoshuvatysya: "O miy Lord, tsi lyudy ne vvazhayutʹ
Vy budete disregard yim ta kazhutʹ, "Myr;" vony bezsumnivno znaydutʹ
